Data Fields
display_info_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Display

Display attributes. More...

#include <display.h>

Detailed Description

This contains the attributes of a display.

Data Fields

u16 width
 display width in pixels
 
u16 height
 display height in pixels
 
void * mem
 A pointer to the shared display memory which is mapped to the screen.
 
void * scratch_mem
 A pointer to the shared display memory which is mapped to the screen.
 
u32 size
 The size of mem in bytes (typically w*h*bits_per_pixel/8)
 
u16 cols
 Number of memory 32-bit word columns.
 
u16 rows
 Number of memory rows.
 
u32 freq
 This value is R/W and specifies how often the screen can be refreshed.
 
u16 o_flags
 Display flags (not used)
 
u16 bits_per_pixel
 
u16 margin_left
 Left margin.
 
u16 margin_right
 Right margin.
 
u16 margin_top
 Top margin.
 
u16 margin_bottom
 Bottom margin.
 

Field Documentation

u16 display_info_t::bits_per_pixel

The number of bits in each pixel: 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 24, or 32
